docs.snippet: District Attorney Nicoll announced yesterday that the absconding embezzler, Francis H. Weeks, who was discovered in Costa Rica about the middle of August by the correspondent of The New-York Times, is now under arrest, and that there would be no...
docs.lead_paragraph: District Attorney Nicoll announced yesterday that the absconding embezzler, Francis H. Weeks, who was discovered in Costa Rica about the middle of August by the correspondent of The New-York Times, is now under arrest, and that there would be no difficulty in effecting his extradition for the purpose of bringing him to this city to be prosecuted under five indictments found against him by the Grand Jury for the embezzlement of $520,660.
docs.abstract: Arrest and Extradition from Costa Rica; District Attorney Nicoll Censures Press for Disclosing Plan

headline.main: HOW THE EMBEZZLER WAS FOUND.; District Attorney Nicoll Makes a Statement -- Detectives to Leave To-Day.

docs.snippet: Brazil has not had a very happy time in the last half dozen years. Some of the smaller South American nations occasionally have outbreaks which are dignified with the title "revolution," but Brazil certainly had a political revolution, not wholly...
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil has not had a very happy time in the last half dozen years. Some of the smaller South American nations occasionally have outbreaks which are dignified with the title "revolution," but Brazil certainly had a political revolution, not wholly without bloodshed. In 1889, and now she seems to be in the throes of another.

headline.main: THE INSURRECTION IN BRAZIL; STORY OF THE CAUSES WHICH HAVE LED TO THE UPRISING. The Downfall of the Empire Under Dom Pedro II. -- How that Monarch Was Forced to Abdicate -- Advent of Gen. Deodoro do Fonseen as a Political Power -- How He Resigned and Made Floriano Peixotto President -- The Naval Forces Against the Government.

docs.snippet: LONDON, Oct. 6. -- Americans were extremely dull to-day; other markets irregular. Louisville was weak on poor traffic reports for the fourth week of September.

docs.snippet: CHICAGO, Oct. 23 -- The present week marks the close of the great series of world's congresses of which Chicago has been the scene during the Columbian season, and on Saturday next the volume will be closed with a final gathering at which the work of...
docs.lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, Oct. 23 -- The present week marks the close of the great series of world's congresses of which Chicago has been the scene during the Columbian season, and on Saturday next the volume will be closed with a final gathering at which the work of the Summer will be reviewed and appropriate statistics presented.

docs.snippet: The Cassell Publishing Company announces that it "will celebrate its reorganization by moving into new quarters in Union Square, where, amid other surroundings, it will try to forget the misfortunes that overthrew the former company." Among the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Cassell Publishing Company announces that it "will celebrate its reorganization by moving into new quarters in Union Square, where, amid other surroundings, it will try to forget the misfortunes that overthrew the former company." Among the earliest issues of the house will be the "Life and Later Speeches of Chauncey M. Depew," and a new novel by Sarah Grand, the author of "The Heavenly Twins."

docs.snippet: LONDON, Dec. 27. -- A dispatch from Pernambuco says that a general engagement between insurgent and Government ships is reported to have taken place at Rio Janeiro. The forts are said to have shared in the battle. The dispatch adds that the firing is...
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Dec. 27. -- A dispatch from Pernambuco says that a general engagement between insurgent and Government ships is reported to have taken place at Rio Janeiro. The forts are said to have shared in the battle. The dispatch adds that the firing is said to have been the heaviest on Dec. 24.

headline.main: NAVAL BATTLE IN RIO HARBOR; GOVERNMENT AND INSURGENT SHIPS REPORTED AS ENGAGED. The Heaviest Firing Said to Have Occurred Last Sunday -- The Forts Took a Part in the Engagement -- This News Comes by Way of Pernambuco, and Is Not Confirmed by Advices from Rio de Janeiro -- Complaints of British Merchants.
